I read the other reviews, and was very eager to try, as I'm staying on,y a few blocks away.  I was hungry early(by Barcelona standards :-) so went at 6:30, and was told they don't open until 7:30. I checked their website, and found this info "Kitchen open from 7am until 4pm and from 7.30pm until midnight.", so I think this listing needs to be updated.
